title: End of season rewards, Dishonorable Question
body: On my account, I have received a dishonorable status as of 9/25/17, and I was wondering, What end of season rewards do I receive, if any?

replies.body: As Lukas mentioned, it depends on the penalty on the account.  If it was a 2 week suspension after the mentioned date then you would not be eligible for rewards.  If it was restrictions, you should be okay for Season Rewards but not Honor Rewards per our [Eligibility FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility).  Let me know if that clears things up!

Does a season ranked border count as a reward? because ive worked so hard for my border and ended up getting a 2 week ban in september, this is my only ban ever on my account and i didn't get my season border..

what kind of punishment do you get? do you got a ban or something like that ? If yeah, you will get no rewards, if you just got some dishonorable, you will get no honor reward, but check the QA about season rewards for more information
You, from my knowledge, will receive ranked rewards but NO HONOR rewards
